Reviews.Title: great camera package
Reviews.Author: Arthur R. Angel "lawyer/proud granddad"
Reviews.Content: The Nikon D3200 is an excellent high-resolution camera with multiple settings and options yet still easy to use for novice photographers. The bundle of lenses, case, tripod, etc provides pretty much everything needed. One issue is the two telephoto and wide-angle lenses need additional adapters. Otherwise, no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous Company - Fabulous Products
Reviews.Author: mcgiggles
Reviews.Content: Best Bundle Package aroundShipped within 2 days and had it in hand several days before original due dateThe entire family can't put this camera down, it has brought out the creative side in all of us. Picture quality is outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 Digital SLR
Reviews.Author: A. Bussiere
Reviews.Content: This was a fantastic purchase.  The photos are phenomenol.  The colors looks like they have been enhanced they are so vidid.The package was a great savings.  I would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Buy this for the camera and the extra lens
Reviews.Author: David L Ziliak
Reviews.Content: The camera and extra lens combo alone makes this worth the money. If you want to take advantage of this camera, expect to replace the tripod and the memory card at the very least.The seller was very prompt and I would buy from Cameta Camera again.

Reviews.Title: This is the review on the quality of the accessories within the bundle
Reviews.Author: Dylan
Reviews.Content: I received my package couple days ago and I'm loving it. I saw a lot of reviews on the camera quality it self, but you can research the camera it self on any site (by the way, it is fantastic). One of my main concerns about purchasing this bundle it is the accessories that came with it. 1. The carrying bag was ok, seems pretty tough and sturdy, but it wont fit everything that came within the bundle. It is surrounded with pads and etc so your camera is definitely not gonna get hurt. 2. The tripod was fairly sturdy. At first it seems kinda weak because it feels kinda empty on the inside but it actually can stand a push or two (I compared with my friend's expensive tripod, and this one felt little weaker, but it is fair for the price). 3. SD card is fine. 4. The cleaning kit and the screen protector is also pretty good and contained most of the stuff you need to clean the camera (for the screen protector, i personally think it will be better if you let a professional do it for you). 5. The 55-200 mm lens is in very good shape. 5. For the Tele and Wide angle lens kit, it was okay. You better off getting an wide angle lens if you choose to take landscape shots. its "okay". Sums everything up, this bundle is great, everything within it seems very reliable and sturdy!!

Reviews.Title: My first DSLR
Reviews.Author: Betsy F.
Reviews.Content: I was a bit daunted by the contents of the bundled items, but once I started using it, I fell in love.  The pictures are absolutely amazing.  I am still learning to use this camera but for anyone who wants to gain confidence in using an dslr, this camera makes is the one!

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Zafarana "Steve Z"
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before buying a DSLR and finally settled on the Nikon D3200 package and I couldn't be happier. I had been using a Nikkromat film camera for many years and knew that Nikon made great products. To be fair some of my friends own Canons and they seem wonderful as well but I'm a bit of a Nikon fan I guess. The kit that I bought came with an 18-55 lens and a 55-200 lens both of which suit my needs perfectly. I use the camera mostly to get reference material for my drawings and paintings, so I need to be able to get great close-ups and long distance shots and this camera really delivers. I know some people complain about the lens you get with kits but these are both Nikon lens and produce fantastic results. Would highly recommend this camera kit.

Reviews.Title: amazing camera
Reviews.Author: Dave Wigman
Reviews.Content: the camera is light and takes fast accurate photographs. the video is absolutely accurate and aside from all the reviews calling it a beginner camera i find myself grabbing it all the time, although i had purchased it as a back up in case my primary camera were to fail. i think this camera is a good example of technology costing less for more.

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: James Bartlett
Reviews.Content: So far it has meet my every expectation. Great picture. And  the Nikon d3200 kit you cannot beat. I would recommend to anyone

Reviews.Title: Arrived earlier than promised
Reviews.Author: Bill Rosenberg
Reviews.Content: Great product, with lots of extras.  Price was nearly the same as at Costco, but all of the extras made this a GREAT deal.

Reviews.Title: Tremendous
Reviews.Author: Tracey
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my olympus DSLR.  It is light and the pictures are phenomenal!  The camera is easy to use and the accessories are fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera unbaleivable deal!
Reviews.Author: yugiohfan97
Reviews.Content: I love the camera the pictures come out crystal clear and all the extras that came with it are amazing.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 camera and gear package
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great camera with a great package.  It is a very good deal.  This kit gets you multiple items that help you with a camera purchase.  It was a nice thing to start my photography equipment collection as a first time photographer.  The D3200 is such a nice camera for beginners with lots of room to grow in my photographing abilities.

Reviews.Title: Great camera; ok bundle
Reviews.Author: Valeria Lopez
Reviews.Content: Tripod is decent quality (for the price)Card reader sucks... luckily I had another around, so I really didn't careCamera case is ok... bulky but roomy; although I just use it to store my equipment, not to take along with me on a daytrip.The rest of the accesories are not the best quality, but we all kinda know that from the start.I love this camera :)

Reviews.Title: An amazing purchase
Reviews.Author: Andrés Fernando Quiñones Valencia
Reviews.Content: I received what I paid for. I wanted this item since a really long time and I got what I expected with a lot of elements that completed the product in a really good way.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Package.
Reviews.Author: James Richard
Reviews.Content: Great camera and great accessories.  Easy to use if you have used a digital camera before.  Packaging was terrific.  Nothing broken or damaged.  Unfortunately, the USB to SD disk adapter malfunctioned on the first use and does not work any more.  I need to contact Cameta Camera about that.  Otherwise, a great package and a really good price.  I opted to go for the 55-200 mm zoom lens in the package because it is a Nikon lens with the VR feature.

Reviews.Title: Awesome find!
Reviews.Author: Kelly Michelle Finn
Reviews.Content: As a new aspiring photographer,  this is a great kit for a great price!  Even the extras are good and don't seem to be cheaply made.  The extra lens is a serious bonus!

Reviews.Title: A++++
Reviews.Author: Yonder
Reviews.Content: Excellent bundle very please with it i would recommend it to any one looking for a entry level dslr add a 50mm 1.8g and you will be all set.

Reviews.Title: Does everything it says it will do.
Reviews.Author: I. H. Chandrachud "Indy"
Reviews.Content: There's nothing more I can add about the camera that others haven't already said. The extras in the kit are pretty nifty.

Reviews.Title: Wonderfull
Reviews.Author: Katherine Spichiger
Reviews.Content: Very nice and complete camera and y bought the book Nikon D3200 for dummies and it is easier to use.

Reviews.Title: great camera package
Reviews.Author: Arthur R. Angel "lawyer/proud granddad"
Reviews.Content: The Nikon D3200 is an excellent high-resolution camera with multiple settings and options yet still easy to use for novice photographers. The bundle of lenses, case, tripod, etc provides pretty much everything needed. One issue is the two telephoto and wide-angle lenses need additional adapters. Otherwise, no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous Company - Fabulous Products
Reviews.Author: mcgiggles
Reviews.Content: Best Bundle Package aroundShipped within 2 days and had it in hand several days before original due dateThe entire family can't put this camera down, it has brought out the creative side in all of us. Picture quality is outstanding.

Reviews.Author: A. Bussiere
Reviews.Content: This was a fantastic purchase.  The photos are phenomenol.  The colors looks like they have been enhanced they are so vidid.The package was a great savings.  I would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: James Bartlett
Reviews.Content: So far it has meet my every expectation. Great picture. And  the Nikon d3200 kit you cannot beat. I would recommend to anyone

Reviews.Title: Arrived earlier than promised
Reviews.Author: Bill Rosenberg
Reviews.Content: Great product, with lots of extras.  Price was nearly the same as at Costco, but all of the extras made this a GREAT deal.

Reviews.Title: Wow, is an understated!
Reviews.Author: old guy
Reviews.Content: I do not know how to illustrate my total and utter shock and how fast my camera came to me, after ordering it, I had it, two days, wow, what a wonderful company,  Secondly, everything was right, and worked, packaged very well, I did not have to fret of replacement, the camera is wonderful, of course its a Nikon, by everything else was and is really well made, the whole kit, just makes feel great about the thought of buying from these folks again, its like finding a trusted friend,  I am a very happy customer, Thank you folks at Cameta Camera!

Reviews.Title: great camera and service
Reviews.Author: customer 1
Reviews.Content: great price compared to other "deals" offered by chain stores.  complete package for the same price as the camera alone.  Nice camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Kit
Reviews.Author: Galen White
Reviews.Content: This was a great value as compared to other electronic outlets.  Other similar deals can be found on ebay or such but I have always experienced good results using Amazon.  The camera takes awesome phtotos but be reminded that the compenents that make up the camera are mainly plastic (body/lens). I am a novice and will use this mostly for kids sports and such.  The accessories aren't the top of the line but complement the camera.  I thought the bag was smallish and am considering a camera backpack for ease of carrying and additional storage space.  Overall I am very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Sarah Jordan
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use although will take some reading of the manual to use some of the unfamiliar features.  I also bought the 55-200mm lense.  We use this often. Great quality. Would recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: Nancy J. Nielsen "MomNN"
Reviews.Content: I am new to DSLR photograpy and this camera is perfect for me. It is easy to use, so far I am mostly using the auto settings, but slowly learning some advanced techniques.  It takes great pictures.  This bundle was an awesome deal. You won't find a better deal anyplace.

Reviews.Title: Got here early and in perfect condition!
Reviews.Author: Jess T
Reviews.Content: It came in the mail sooner than I expected! I'm still learning all the in's and out's but the camera is in perfect working order, as is all the gear that came with it! I would definitely buy from this company again!

Reviews.Title: VRS
Reviews.Author: Van Staley
Reviews.Content: Great camera kit was a birthday present for my wife and she is really pleased with it everything works as advertised and she loves the ease of use. Now i'll get the one she was using lol.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: DF
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my son. everything was delivered as promissed no issue's with anything in the bundle.He is the envy of his video class. camera is better than the one the teacher uses and he is a professional Photographer.

Reviews.Title: Complete package
Reviews.Author: Manuel Apolayo
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift to my wife, she is completely happy with it. It's a complete combo for the beginners, and for experienced users.

Reviews.Title: Great price & camera!
Reviews.Author: Gerald Massa
Reviews.Content: I purchased the camera bundle - great price & the number of items is fantastic.  Looking forward to using it.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Black) + <2> Nikon 55-200mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Transcend 16GB Class10 SD Card +
<4> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case + <5> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <6> Additional Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <8> Precision Design 57" Tripod + <9> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Black) + 55-200mm VR Lens + 16GB Card + Case + Filters + Tripod + Telephoto & Wide-Angle Lens Kit
